alert.note: Alert for Limestone; Madison (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 13 at 4:29PM CDT until August 13 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Madison County in north central Alabama... Eastern Limestone County in north central Alabama... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 429 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Hazel Green to Huntsville to near Madison, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Madison, Moores Mill, Redstone Arsenal, Meridianville, Hazel Green, Owens Cross Roads, Gurley, Triana and Marshall Space Flight Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
